Content.Text:
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is such a peaceful, beautiful
place. It's purifying for the soul.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Indeed, Master Amir. We were right to
choose this town as our subject.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I agree. An excellent choice.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh? Who's that over there?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, Ms. <MYNAME>. She's the central figure
in the expansion of this town.
<PAGE>
Master Amir, why don't we go and talk to
her?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good idea. Let's see what she has to
say.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you want me to talk to her?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, I'll do it. You wait here.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good, Master Amir. I will wait
here.
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you out for a walk?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry if I surprised you. I was out for
a walk with Sanjay and saw you over 
here, so just came to say hello.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sanjay told me that you are central to
the expansion of this town.
<PAGE>
Yet must be around the same age as me.
That's quite impressive.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, I'm being totally serious here. It
made me want to come and talk to you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the most important thing when
making a town, do you think?
Advanced modernization
Match existing characteristics

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You're trying to modernize the town? I
see...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No, it's no matter. I'll be taking my
leave of you now.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What did Ms. <MYNAME> have to say?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I thought she shared the same ideals as
myself, but apparently I was mistaken.
Let's go home, Sanjay.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good, Master Amir.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So rather than focusing on just being
more convenient, you take nature and the
environment into account too?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I think that must be what makes this
such an easy place to live.
<PAGE>
You've given me something to think
about, definitely. I think you're stance
toward your work is very commendable.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's no need for false modesty. In
fact, I think you should be very proud.
<PAGE>
I'm glad I talked to you today. Do you
think we could talk again soon?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm looking forward to it already. I
will see you later.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What did Ms. <MYNAME> have to say?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Her way of thinking is very close to my
own.
<PAGE>
I think observing the way this town is
developing will be of great help in
developing our own towns at home.
<PAGE>
Let's go back, Sanjay.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good, Master Amir.
